name: market for weaving, synthetic fibre | weaving, synthetic fibre | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19909/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is a market dataset delivering the service of weaving, synthetic fibre. No transportation is included.

Activity starts at the location that the service is available.

Activity ends with the service being delivered to the respective consumers.
